Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Ennai Vadathisaiyin Vazhiyaaga Velippraagaaraththile Purappadappanni, Praththiyegamaana Idaththukku Edhiraagavum, Maaligaikku Edhiraagavum Vadakke Irundha Araiveedugalukku Ennai Azhaiththukkonduponaar.
2 nooru Muzha Neelaththukku Munne Vadakku Vaasal Irundhadhu; Avvidaththu Agalam Aimbadhu Muzham.
3 utpraagaaraththil Irundha Irubadhu Muzhaththukku Edhiraagavum Velippraagaaraththil Irundha Thalavarisaikku Edhiraagavum Ondrukkondru Edhiraana Moondru Nilaigalulla Nadaikaavanangal Irundhadhu.
4 utpuraththile Araiveedugalin Munbaagap Paththu Muzha Agalamaana Vazhiyum, Oru Muzha Agalamaana Paadhaiyum Irundhadhu; Avaigalin Vaasalgal Vadakke Irundhadhu.
5 uyara Irundha Araiveedugal Agalakkattaiyaayirundhadhu; Nadaikaavanangal Keezheyirukkira Araiveedugalukkum Naduveyirukkiravaigalukkum Adhiga Uyaramaana Maaligaiyaayirundhadhu.

6 avaigal Moondru Adukkugalaayirundhadhu; Praagaarangalin Thoongalukku Irundhadhupola, Avaigalukkuth Thoongalillai; Aagaiyaal Tharaiyilirundhu Alakka, Avaigal Keezheyum Naduveyum Irukkiravaigalaip Paarkkilum Agalakkattaiyaayirundhadhu.
7 purambe Araiveedugalukku Edhire Velippraagaarath Thisaiyil Arai Veedugalukku Munbaaga Irundha Madhilin Neelam Aimbadhu Muzham.
8 velippraagaaraththilulla Araiveedugalin Neelam Aimbadhu Muzham, Dhevaalayaththukku Munne Nooru Muzhamaayirundhadhu.
9 kizhakke Velippraagaaraththilirundhu Andha Araiveedugalukkul Pravesikkira Nadai Avaigalin Keezhe Irundhadhu.
10 keezhththisaiyaana Praagaaraththu Madhilin Agalaththile Praththiyegamaana Idaththukku Munbaagavum Maaligaikku Munbaagavum Araiveedugalum Irundhadhu.
11 avaigalukku Munnaana Vazhiyile Andha Araiveedugal Neelaththilum Agalaththilum Ellaa Vaasarpadigalilum, Thittangalilum, Vaasal Nadaigalilum Vadathisaiyaana Araiveedugalin Saayalaayirundhadhu.

12 thenthisaiyaana Araiveedugalin Vaasal Nadaikku Oppaaga Oru Vaasal Nadaivazhiyin Mugappil Irundhadhu; Keezhththisaiyil Avaigalukkup Pravesikkum Idaththile Semmaiyaana Madhilin Edhire Irundha Vazhiyin Mugappil Oru Vaasalirundhadhu.

13 avar Ennai Nokki: Praththiyegamaana Idaththukku Munnirukkira Vadapuramaana Araiveedugalum Thenpuramaana Araiveedugalum Parisuththa Araiveedugalaayirukkiradhu; Karththaridaththil Serugira Aasaariyar Ange Magaa Parisuththamaanadhaiyum, Pojanapaliyaiyum, Paavanivaarana Paliyaiyum, Kutranivaarana Paliyaiyum Vaippaargal; Andha Sthalam Parisuththamaayirukkiradhu.

14 aasaariyar Utpravesikkumpodhu, Avargal Parisuththa Sthalaththirundhu Velippraagaaraththukku Varaadhadharkumunne, Ange Thaangal Aaraadhanai Seydhu Uduththiyirundha Vasthirangalaik Kazhatri Vaippaargal; Avvasthirangal Parisuththamaanavaigal; Vere Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondu, Janaththin Praagaaraththile Povaargal Endraar.
15 avar Ulveettai Alandhu Theerndhapinbu, Keezhththisaikku Edhiraana Vaasalvazhiyaai Ennai Veliye Azhaiththukkondupoi, Adhaichchutrilum Alandhaar.
16 keezhththisaip Pakkaththai Alavukolaal Alandhaar; Adhu Alavukolinpadiye Sutrilum Ainnoorukolaayirundhadhu.
17 vadathisaippakkaththai Alavukolaal Sutrilum Ainnoorukolaai Alandhaar.
18 thenthisaippakkaththai Alavukolaal Ainnooru Kolaai Alandhaar.
19 metrisaip Pakkaththukkuth Thirumbi Adhai Alavukolaal Ainnooru Kolaai Alandhaar.

20 naalu Pakkangalilum Adhai Alandhaar; Parisuththamaanadharkum Parisuththamillaadhadharkum Viththiyaasampannumpadikku Adharku Ainnooru Kol Neelamum Ainnooru Kol Agalamumaana Madhil Sutrilum Irundhadhu.
